title.label: Fixing needed but only a bit

content.label: Love the game concept and story as well. All very interesting and keeps me wanting to play. But AI needs to toned down. No way a GK is going to anticipate a shot and where it going from 2 yards. And no way would the best GK in the world be able to make the saves the AI GK in the game makes over and over. I canâ€™t pass to my teammates for header passes that are sometimes the only way to progress the play. Got a hang of passing cross field but was a challenge still. Mostly AI fixed needed but fine game overall.

Everything in the game is fine, but there are some flaws. Like the players sometimes dribble out of bounce and you have no control over it. Or the player is dribbling up the field and the other player just kicks the ball away.
Nice game

This game is well made and fun to play...sometimes. this game would be more fun and enjoying if it didnt have the amount of lives it should just be unlimited so we can enjoy the game. its also annoying that you lose your lives mostly because your team or because of game bugs. a lot times when i kick the ball to my team they just run the ball out of bounds. also its like your team gives up they should also add where ur team can recover the ball because the fact that the level ends when the ball is in your possession is just terrible. also if the defenders go near you or barely touch the ball your team gives up and fails you the level. PLEASE FIX THESE ISSUES!!

This game can be fun but the unrealistic gameplay is just so bad that I canâ€™t even play it. The defenders are superhuman and win every single ball out of the air. Itâ€™s very frustrating trying pass a level when your own player dribbles out of bounds when they should be taking less touches possible. The keeper makes absurd saves that defy human physics. The game is just broken. The heart system is some crap, 90% the time I lose hearts by my own player messing up. If your team didnâ€™t make so many errors and the keeper reacted like a real human would than this game wound be decent

title.label: The game glitches constantly but there is great potential

content.label: Sometimes when you pass the ball a player will glitch and u have to start over on the round. Other times the player will get it in midfield then glitch and run out of bounds. Make a few changes on those issues and you have a decent game.  Note u don't actually play a how round there are just different levels u have to play. The glitches are the biggest problem like when u are on the fourth part of a four part level them it glitches and makes u restart. The goalie also makes inhuman blocks which makes the game frustrating.
Fun game but your health runs out and you have to wait or purchase more. Annoying AF

Oh boy, where to start. The game mechanics are actually kinda fun, plotting out passes/shots and the like. Whatâ€™s absolutely infuriating is how your team of â€˜prosâ€™ play worse than a little league team. Once you get through a few â€˜seasonsâ€™, your team players become complete buffoons, trying their best to get you to buy more money for redos. Maybe put some real soccer players in the game but I still love the game

This game rigs it so that you canâ€™t do anything unless you do it perfectly. It has a good concept but itâ€™s the small details that matter. You will be on a one on one against the keeper but it will make you shoot from outside the box. You will play for teams like United and Chelsea but will go 2 goals down to Stoke. The passing will sometimes wait until the defender is completely in front of you and block anything you do. They expect you to sometimes score 4 goals in a row without mistakes and if you do make a mistake you have to start all over, not before the last goal you scored. Please fix your game and I download it again.

This app has died out due to the fact that the Devs refuse to fix the intentionally rigged AI. Itâ€™s not challenging your skill, it challenges your patience with the gameâ€™s logic. Would be a fantastic game if theyâ€™d just stop the defending AI from being far too overpowered, and stop your teammates from being far too underpowered. (I wrote this review after a teammate, who I passed to, dribbled the ball from midfield to out of bounds). *The AI starts picking every pass off as well by simply being faster than your slow team. *

Once you get to level 46 the levels just become extremely difficult. Canâ€™t even pass to a team mate whose in front of with out a defender coming out of no where and stealing the ball.
